headline.print_headline: Kurds Realize Dream as Baghdad Loses Grip on North Iraq
headline.main: Kurds Realize Dream as Baghdad Loses Grip on North Iraq

lead_paragraph: Poets wrote songs about it for generations. Guerrilla fighters holed up in the mountains trained for it for decades. But in the end, when a Kurdish army finally took control of Kirkuk, they realized the dream of their forefathers within hours, without having to fire a shot.
